title: Compton - photon lambda and p before and after

content.description: An X-ray photon scatters off of a free electron that is initially at rest, and the photon is deflected by an angle of <math alttext="45" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>45</mn></math> degrees from its initial trajectory. How do the photon’s wavelength and the magnitude of the photon’s momentum after the scattering event compare to their values before scattering?
